CodeBlockMethod.Name: description
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 모든 Unit 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- 유닛 정보 관리(저장은 Common에서) -- 사망, 피격, 데미지 계산, 이펙트 관리 -- 몬스터 관련 엔티티 생성(체력바)

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
-- 체력바 생성 local Entity = self.Entity local Common = _EntityService:GetEntityByPath("/common") local Name = _UtilLogic:Split(Entity.Name, "_")[1]
self.UnitInfo = Common.Common.Unit[Name]
if self:IsServer() then self.Hp = self.UnitInfo["MaxHp"]
local HpBarModelID = "model://67e61995-f382-4f20-ae44-94c1e8849d5c" local UnitBoxSize = Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(HpBarModelID, "UnitHpBar", Vector3(0, UnitBoxSize.y + 0.1, 0), Entity, nil) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ConvertAttackRange
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local AttackRange = Vector2.zero
if AttackRange_x == "h" then AttackRange.x = Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize.x else AttackRange.x = tonumber(AttackRange_x) end
if AttackRange_y == "h" then AttackRange.y = Entity.HitComponent.BoxSize.y else AttackRange.y = tonumber(AttackRange_y) end
return AttackRange

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Die
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local Players = _UserService.UserEntities
Entity.MovementComponent:Stop() Entity.StateComponent:ChangeState("DEAD")
local delayDie = function() Entity:Destroy() end
-- 선택된 유닛이 죽었을지도 모르므로... for Id, UserEntity in pairs(Players) do if UserEntity.BuilderInput ~= nil then UserEntity.BuilderInput:DeleteUnit(Entity) end end
_TimerService:ClearTimer(Entity.UnitAIComponent.AttackTimerId) _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(delayDie, self.UnitInfo["DieDelay"])

CodeBlockMethod.Name: Hit
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity
Entity.MovementComponent:Stop() -- ChangeState 안해줘도 알아서 HIT으로 바뀜... --Entity.StateComponent:ChangeState("HIT")
local delayHit = function() if isvalid(Entity) and Entity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName ~= "DEAD" then Entity.StateComponent:ChangeState("MOVE") end end _TimerService:SetTimerOnce(delayHit, self.UnitInfo["HitDelay"])

CodeBlockMethod.Name: CalcDmg
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
self.Hp = self.Hp - damage
if self.Hp > self.UnitInfo["MaxHp"] then self.Hp = self.UnitInfo["MaxHp"] end
self:SetHpBar()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SetHpBar
CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- MaxHp와 Hp가 바로 클라이언트로 동기화 되지 않으므로 -- 0.1초동안 동기화를 기다림 wait(0.1) self.Entity:GetChildByName("UnitHpBar").SpriteGUIRendererComponent.FillAmount = self.Hp / self.UnitInfo["MaxHp"]

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleHitEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code:
-- Parameters local AttackCenter = event.AttackCenter local AttackerEntity = event.AttackerEntity local Damages = event.Damages local Extra = event.Extra local FeedbackAction = event.FeedbackAction local IsCritical = event.IsCritical local TotalDamage = event.TotalDamage
-------------------------------------------------------- local Entity = self.Entity local CurrentStateName = Entity.StateComponent.CurrentStateName
local originalHp = self.Hp self:CalcDmg(TotalDamage)
if self.Hp <= 0 then self:Die() else self:Hit() end
